channel.title: Uploading my server to my webspace?
channel.description:
Hi..
I have a working webclient.. I want to host my server on my "Paid" webprovider and have my webclient connect to it.. I need help on uploading the server, I got the rest..
I looked for a tut on this, all I keep finding is no-ip stuff and port forwarding.. I don't want it to run from my pc..
thanks..
I am still looking at this moment for a tut..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2009, 06:27:10 pm[/size][hr]wow.. I guess there is no way to do this?
